app.name: Nintendont
app.long_description:
Commiters: dreamsyntax, GerbilSoft, JoostinOnline, GreyRogue, Howard, Cyan, nastys
Project website: https://github.com/ShadowTheHedgehogHacking/Nintendont-2PMod-Fix
Patched version of Nintendont for compatibility with v2.0+ 2P-ShdTH mod. Will not work with other games.
